p: M. sinensis and M. paradisiaca fruits were obtained for this study from supermarkets in Alice and East London, located in the Amathole District Municipality, Eastern Cape Province, South Africa (latitude 32°43′28.66″; longitude 26°34′5.88″), and were authenticated by Professor C. N. Cupido, a taxonomist in the Botany Department, University of Fort Hare (UFH); afterwards, voucher specimens were deposited in the herbarium (UFH-2019-11-001 and UFH-2019-12-002).
